title: Did Paden like to play ball with black athletes to the "green mile "?
subtitle: The film Green Mile highlights the disparity between sentencing and the treatment of prisoners in white and black prisons during the Great Depression.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In an interview on November 3, 2020 with journalists in Wilmington, Delaware, the democratic presidential candidate of the United States, Joe Baiden, compared his experiences of playing ball with black athletes in the Green Mill of Stephen King.
